works.description:
ZeptoLab UK Limited™ ("ZeptoLab") is a UK  
company and the owner and developer of the game Cut the Rope™.  Cut the  
Rope was released via the Apple App Store on October 4, 2010 and gained  
international success very quickly, reaching the #1 selling app spot within  
two days of release and becoming the first mobile app to win a British  
Academy of Video Games award  
(http://www.bafta.org/games/awards/video-games-awards-nominees-in-2010,1656,BA.html#jump6).  
Since that time, the app has grown into a major success and has spawned   
merchandise, follow-on games, cartoons, comic books and other products and  
media. (see www.cuttherope.ie,
